content: Set up project structure with proper directory layout
Create package.json with all required dependencies (Express, TypeScript, testing frameworks)
Implement TypeScript configuration and build setup
Create main app.ts with Express server setup, CORS, and middleware
Implement hello routes with all specified endpoints (/, /hello, /hello/:name, /health)
Add request logging middleware and error handling middleware
Implement multiple response formats (JSON, text, XML) based on query parameter
Create comprehensive test suite with >80% coverage
Create detailed README with setup and usage instructions
Add .gitignore and other project configuration files
Verify all endpoints work and match PRD specifications exactly
